Reviews.Title: The box that holds the spool was such poor material that the handles broke very easily
Reviews.Author: M. Umair
Reviews.Content: I've been buying rg59 spools for 2-3 years now from amazon from different companies and vendors and this is the first rg59 spool I had to return.The cardbox box that holds the rg59 spool was extermely soft and weak.  Just by taking that spool box out of the delivery box resulted in a ripped handle.  I tried to use the other handle to carry it and with just a slight pull the other handle ripped too.  I'm not sure about other installers, but I need something with durable handles so i can easily carry around the rg59 spool during installations.  I had to return this,I hope GW Security ships future rg59 spools in more durable carrying boxes.  I just purchased a CIB rg59 spool from amazon (no prime shipping but at least if was free) and the handles on the spool box are reinforced with a plastic grip and the box is much sturdier and has yet to break on me.

ProductInfo.Features:
500 Feet Spool In A Box
RG59 Siamese Power/Video Combo Cable
RG59
video cable
cable
ProductInfo.Name: 500 Feet RG59 Siamese Power & Video Combo Cable for CCTV Surveillance Video Camera Security System (500ft Spool In A Box)
